titleStmt.title: Cheirothesia tou presbyteriou, or, A letter to a friend tending to prove I. that valid ordination ought not to be repeated, II. that ordination by presbyters is valid : with an appendix in which some brief animadversions are made upon a lately published discourse of M. John Humfrey, concerning re-ordination / by R.A., a lover of truth and peace.
titleStmt.author: R. A. (Richard Alleine), 1611-1681.

titleStmt.title: Cheirothesia tou presbyteriou, or, A letter to a friend tending to prove I. that valid ordination ought not to be repeated, II. that ordination by presbyters is valid : with an appendix in which some brief animadversions are made upon a lately published discourse of M. John Humfrey, concerning re-ordination / by R.A., a lover of truth and peace.
titleStmt.author: R. A. (Richard Alleine), 1611-1681.
Humfrey, John, 1621-1719. Question of re-ordination.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J.S. and are to be sold in Westminster-Hall and Paul's Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Alleine by Halkett & Laing.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
